data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring measurements of Abies alba (Silver fir) from sample C-ALTA-130

Exposition NE, Slope 40 deg, Geology: Kalkschutt, Tree line 2100 m, av. Tree height 30 m, Tree cover 80%, Shrub cover 5%, Herb cover 50%, Moss cover 60%, Vegatation type: basisch,normarl drainiert, Film number: 256
